22.1.hd_quote: The ability to accept and enjoy a subordinate position.
22.1.behavioral_axis: Opens social space by yielding first; empowers others to speak.
22.1.shadow_axis: Humiliation or resentment when forcing first place.

22.2.hd_quote: The belief that style can mask nature.
22.2.behavioral_axis: Generates attention through style; may lack substance to deliver mutation.

22.3.hd_quote: Form as a definition and actualization of substance.
22.3.behavioral_axis: Displays irresistible grace briefly; bonds made/broken by mood.
22.3.shadow_axis: Mixed signals; others mistake openness for intimacy.

22.4.hd_quote: The modification of behavior to enrich interactions.
22.4.behavioral_axis: Adjusts behavior to create real contact and opportunity.

22.5.hd_quote: The disregard of form when required.
22.5.behavioral_axis: Acts or speaks only when in the mood; then it lands universally.
22.5.shadow_axis: Forcing performance; crude reputation when mismatched.

22.6.hd_quote: The alignment with experience of form with substance.
22.6.behavioral_axis: Embodies seasoned grace that points to a new social horizon.
